Message: Hi, Iâ€™m the NewsBreak Ad Assistant. How can I help?
The user completes the submission of the form

I am trying to test the NewsBreak postback that I placed in our everflow account. When inserting the test link, I am getting an error message that says "Please input a valid URL. Start with http:// or https://". The URL i am inputting is valid and has https:// at the start of it. How do I fix this issue>?

It sounds like there might be a formatting issue with the URL you're using. Make sure that the URL is correctly formatted and doesn't have any extra spaces or characters. Double-check that the URL starts with 'https://' and is complete without any typos. If you're still facing issues, you can refer to the Everflow Postback setup guide for more detailed instructions: [How to set up an Everflow Postback on NewsBreak](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/22576502022285-How-to-set-up-an-Everflow-Postback-on-NewsBreak). Let me know if you need further assistance!
